title: Hatred

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Rampage attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As long as you are alive, all roles' goals are replaced by "Eliminate all players except for Hatred and you."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all players except for up to one other player and you.

desc:
Post 324
*The emotion that has always burned the brightest.*
